column4: Hi, does anyone know why there is no image file and only headers located here, http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/v3.4-rc7-precise/  ?
someone from canonical asked me to test the latest upstream kernel for an ongoing kernel bug, he said 3.4-rc7 however there is no image so im a bit confused now
it is only available in QQ 12.04
